Name: cement production, CEM II/A | cement, CEM II/A | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
Description: In this dataset, the production of CEM II/A is described, where clinker (77.7%) is ground together with gypsum (4.9%) and mixed with limestone (15%), silica fume, blast furnace slag and ground granulated blast furnace slag (GGBFS). The activity includes also the input of electricity used for the grinding of the clinker, grinding aids (ethylene glycol and iron sulfate) and heat (heavy fuel oil) for the drying of additions.
